design_system.name: Cloud Watcher - Neo-Brutalist Ops
design_system.description: A high-contrast, raw, and technical design system for DevOps professionals. Rejects softness for clarity and impact.

Button.base: font-mono font-bold uppercase tracking-wider transition-all active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px]

variants.default: bg-primary text-primary-foreground border-2 border-transparent hover:border-white hover:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#FFFFFF]
variants.outline: bg-transparent text-foreground border-2 border-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#CCFF00]

Input.base: bg-input border-2 border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 focus:shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#CCFF00] placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50 font-mono

Table.header: bg-muted text-muted-foreground uppercase tracking-wider font-bold border-b-2 border-border

Badge.base: rounded-none border-2 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-bold uppercase

instructions_to_main_agent: INSTALLATION: Run `yarn add react-icons` immediately to support provider logos.
FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import link to `public/index.html` or `src/index.css`.
TAILWIND: Update `tailwind.config.js` to extend the theme with the colors and border radius defined above. CRITICAL: Set `borderRadius` to `0` for all components to achieve the sharp edge look.
SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, override the default `rounded-md` classes with `rounded-none`.
ICONS: Use `react-icons/fa` (FontAwesome) or `react-icons/si` (Simple Icons) for AWS, Azure, GCP, and DigitalOcean logos. Do not use external images for these logos.
LAYOUT: Use the 'Bento' grid strategy. Create a dashboard layout with a fixed sidebar and a scrollable main content area.
CHARTS: Use `recharts` with the custom neon color palette defined in `colors.chart_colors`. Avoid gradients in charts; use solid strokes.
INTERACTIONS: Add hover states to all interactive elements. The 'hard shadow' effect (box-shadow moving on hover) is key to the Neo-Brutalist feel.
DATA-TESTID: Ensure every button, input, and link has a `data-testid` attribute (e.g., `data-testid='sync-now-btn'`).
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure high contrast for all text. Use the `primary` color for key actions and `destructive` for critical alerts.
Avoid 'soft' UI elements like large blur radii or rounded corners.
Use uppercase text for labels, headers, and buttons to enhance the 'technical' feel.
Keep the UI dense but legible. Use `JetBrains Mono` for all data-heavy components (tables, logs, stats).
